alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 10:50AM EST until March 09 at 7:30PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River, Flatrock River, Big Blue River, Driftwood River, and the East Fork White River. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Blue River at Shelbyville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, High water affects trucking firm on Boggstown Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 14.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM EST Tuesday was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1045 PM EST.
